results.deck: The Hit Squad was a publisher of budget titles
results.description:
Â 
The Hit Squad was the budget label of Ocean software founded in 1989, although it released many other titles from other developers which moved into the budget range. These developers included Virgin, Domark, Activision, Electronic Arts and others. The Hit Squad went defunct in 1994.
results.name: The Hit Squad
